name: Magby
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

attacks.name: Sputter
attacks.effect: All Pokémon Powers stop working until the end of your next turn.

rule_box: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything required in order to use that attack). If tails, your opponent’s turn ends without an attack.
